/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the city's daily life. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a corridor of urban architecture and greenery. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The road itself is filled with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky.
